attributes.action:
Pass the bill for increase sentences  
for  animal cruelty
attributes.additional_details:
The draft Animal Welfare (Sentencing and Recognition of Sentience) Bill. August 2018
This was agreed in parliament to be passed, still waiting . We need this now to protect animals
attributes.background: The government agreed in Aug 2018, that a bill should be passed to increase the maximum sentence for animal cruelty to 5 years
